James Warren

ESC

App Design & Development
UX Development

ESC is a digital story-telling platform that re-connects people with places and nature.

Tell a Story

Tell the story of your adventure, from the green wilderness to those hidden urban gems.

Collaborate with fellow adventurers: places tell their own stories.

Re-connecting People with Place

Curated escape ideas and suggestions, from the story feed.

Discover your nearby escape through the mobile app. Instantly share your story and photos in the moment.

Technology Stack

Front-end

An Angular.js application consuming the API through web sockets, to enable real-time interactions.

Back-end

The server-side portion of the application provides a RESTful API service with support for web socket connections, built on the Sails.js framework. MongoDB is used as the primary datastore.

What's Next?

ESC is currently in a concept and design phase. We look forward to ploughing on with development but we're keen to apply some more thought and develop the concept further.

Next on the roadmap:

  1. UX design strategy
  2. UI mockups
